comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Isabella May "Queenie" Gourlay Dunn (1880-1948) was a golf pro from a big family of golfers. Her first husband Willie Webb was one of the founders of the PGA. Her second husband was Adolf Hupfel. www.northberwick.org.uk/dunn.html Her father was Tom Dunn: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tom_Dunn_%28golf_course_architect%29 Her obituary: news2.nnyln.net/adirondack-enterprise/1948/adirondack-ent...

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: See also localwiki.net/hsl/May_Gourlay_Hupfel She was believed to have been America's first woman professional golfer.

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: pennylrichardsca and B-59: Thanks for the info and links to more information on Dunn. We will add more about her to the record.
